channel.title: Help me!
channel.description:
OK,my server was working absolutley fine yesterday,but today,when I pressed "R" to run it,and enter.It took me to runserver and said, [glow=red,2,300]"C:/documents and settings/alex/desktop/testscape_source/testscape source/runserver.bat is not a valid win32 application."[/glow]also,I got this [glow=red,2,300] You do not have a server class,Make sure that you have you have used the compiler with the server BEFORE you try running it.[/glow]
But I didn't want to open runserver.All i wanted to do was clcik on compile once,press "R" and enter so it started up the server.Thats what I did yesterday,and it worked fine.
Oh and,there might be something important in here.
things I did before running the server this morning-
But I did that yesterday and it worked.Copyed and pasted phonchecks fight pits tut yesterday night into the compile.Copy+paste the codes in compile into run-server so it worked.(huge amount of codes). The server is supposedly on HAM.I was running hamachi when i was on it.When i disabled hamachi it wouldin't work-so,yea,its a HAM server.[/glow]I also pressed,C,R,ENTER.To run it.=,Usualy i just do "R" and ENTER".
Basically When i press "R" to run the server and enter to run the server,( while i clicked on compile,one mouse click as I did before)(witch worked)it switched to runserver and didn't work.
SO-I need help on.
[glow=red,2,300]Running the server again. stopping the thing switch to runserver from compile-thats probably why it wont run. I need it to keep on compile for it to work. Basically when i press r to run the server on "compile"it switches it to runserver.How do I stop this? Also,It worked fine yesterday,but there are some errors today. Was I supposed to copy+paste the stuff in compile into runserver???If im not thats probably a problem too.I did that because A little of the stuff I coded didn't work.So i thought it would work if i copyed+pasted into"runserver"[/glow]

item.title: Help me!
item.dc:creator: @curse63 curse63
item.description:
@curse63 wrote:

OK,my server was working absolutley fine yesterday,but today,when I pressed “R” to run it,and enter.It took me to runserver and said, [glow=red,2,300]“C:/documents and settings/alex/desktop/testscape_source/testscape source/runserver.bat is not a valid win32 application.”[/glow]also,I got this [glow=red,2,300] You do not have a server class,Make sure that you have you have used the compiler with the server BEFORE you try running it.[/glow]

But I didn’t want to open runserver.All i wanted to do was clcik on compile once,press “R” and enter so it started up the server.Thats what I did yesterday,and it worked fine.

Oh and,there might be something important in here.

things I did before running the server this morning-

But I did that yesterday and it worked.Copyed and pasted phonchecks fight pits tut yesterday night into the compile.Copy+paste the codes in compile into run-server so it worked.(huge amount of codes).
The server is supposedly on HAM.I was running hamachi when i was on it.When i disabled hamachi it wouldin’t work-so,yea,its a HAM server.[/glow]I also pressed,C,R,ENTER.To run it.=,Usualy i just do “R” and ENTER".

Basically When i press “R” to run the server and enter to run the server,( while i clicked on compile,one mouse click as I did before)(witch worked)it switched to runserver and didn’t work.

SO-I need help on.

[glow=red,2,300]Running the server again.
stopping the thing switch to runserver from compile-thats probably why it wont run.
I need it to keep on compile for it to work.
Basically when i press r to run the server on “compile"it switches it to runserver.How do I stop this?
Also,It worked fine yesterday,but there are some errors today.
Was I supposed to copy+paste the stuff in compile into runserver???If im not thats probably a problem too.I did that because A little of the stuff I coded didn’t work.So i thought it would work if i copyed+pasted into"runserver”[/glow]
